attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call for Pariament to debate a no confidence vote in the Government.  Neither party received a mandate from the population for this Coalition Government and many policies and reforms currently being put before Parliament were not in either of the Coalition Party's manifesto.

We require MPs to hold a debate and a vote on this no confidence motion and democracy of the electorate to prevail.  If a no confidence vote is passed in the debate, we expect the Government to call a general election with immediate effect.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament not the Government.
